metadata.title: Configure Tailwind CSS v4 & Design System

story.iWant: configure Tailwind CSS v4 and the X-AI design system
story.soThat: the application matches the "AI era" aesthetic requirements
story.tasks: - Install Tailwind CSS v4 (AC: 1) - Configure Design System (AC: 2, 3) - Implement Glassmorphism Utility (AC: 4) - Verification (AC: 5)

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: - 1. Tailwind CSS v4 and dependencies installed (`tailwindcss`, `postcss`, `autoprefixer`). - 2. Tailwind configured with specific project colors: Primary: `#0df2f2`, Secondary Violet: `#8b5cf6`, Background Dark: `#09090b`. - 3. `Inter` font imported from Google Fonts and set as default sans font. - 4. Global `.glass` utility class implemented with `backdrop-filter: blur(12px)`. - 5. Color palette verified in a basic component.

story-context.constraints: - Use exact hex colors: #0df2f2 (cyan), #8b5cf6 (violet), #09090b (dark bg). - Default sans font: Inter (Google Fonts). - Glass blur: 12px. - Follow Tailwind v4 configuration patterns.
